title: my problem
body: okay sooooooo i had rencent had a wait time for being afk in a ranked match i won, i was only afk because my wifi disconnected and i was only afk for 3 min, right now me and my friend were waiting for a all for one, i had 3 wait timers left, and so we started it waited and my friends left champion select, so we waited 5 min so on top of wait the 20 min i had, my client restarted another wait timer so we waited 25 min and the client glitched and mad us wait another 20 min after the 25 we just waited, and i am asking if you guys can remove the wait timers for me because i waited an hour and havent been able to play anything. pls and ty  if you guys choose to do so, my IGN is beblackguy and im on na

replies.body:
Disconnections negatively affect everyone in the match, regardless if it was intentional or not. This is why disconnections are all treated equally and why penalties cannot be removed or modified.

Disconnections from queue are often the result of your client not establishing a stable link to the servers. As a first step, I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as it commonly resolves these issues.

Let me know if those steps helped.
